trends: There have been no other sightings in Ocean View
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailslights were shining through my windows about 11 at night ,so i went out to see what it was. i saw 2 pure white lights in the sky,one much bigger than the other moving slowly across the sky.i went inside to find my camera but could not,so i went back outside.now there were 3 lights-1 big 2 smaller. one smaller was moving west in the opposite direction. the other small one was goig nuts circling & zig-zagging around the bigger one.about that time i heared a jet comming from the southeast,cause the objects made no noise.i thought this should be good! all of a sudden a flash came from the jet & went towards the two lights. the two took off out to sea,they were almost out of site anyway cause of trees,but the other one,going west took off,but not like a shot,but was out of site in seconds. the only thing left was the jet going out to sea.i said to myself what the hell did i just see! this is the first time i told anybody but a couple of freinds-cause the thought i was nuts, but i knw what i saw.
